name: The Grand Canyon Tour
summary: A tour of the Grand Canyon
description: This tour takes you to the Grand Canyon, one of the Seven Natural Wonders of the World. You'll see the canyon from all angles, and learn about its history and geology.

startLocation.description: The start of the tour is at the South Rim of the Grand Canyon.

locations.address: Desert View Point, Grand Canyon National Park, Arizona
locations.description: A scenic overlook with views of the canyon

locations.address: Mather Point, Grand Canyon National Park, Arizona
locations.description: A popular viewpoint with views of the canyon
